participant_1.background:
I often snack too much on sweets, even though I know it's not good for my health.
I worked at a call center before I got my job at the factory.
i freeze up in social situations.
my feet are size six womens.
i run a small bakery.

participant_2.background:
I'm not sure of my current weight, but I'm working on it.
i work on semi trucks for a living.
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about medicine and dust allergies.
I used to go bowling with my parents on weekends.
my family owns a grocery store.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I am good! Just got home from work and I am relaxing. How about you?
I am doing well! I am just getting ready for work. I work at a small bakery. Do you have any hobbies?
That sounds cool! I used to bowl on weekends with my parents, but I haven't been in a while. I like to read about medicine and dust allergies. What about you?
I love to bake! I also like to go hiking and camping. I have been trying to get into gardening, but I am not very good at it yet.
Baking sounds delicious! I love to eat, so I would love to try some of your baked goods. What kind of plants do you have in your garden?
I have some flowers, vegetables, and herbs. I am still learning, so I have a lot to learn!
That sounds great! I hope you have a great day at work!
Thank you! I hope you have a great day as well!
